summary: The Loans In Our Neighborhoods Act of 2025 (LIONs Act) aims to amend the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958. It increases the maximum loan amounts for certain small business loans. Specifically, it raises the maximum 7(a) loan amount to $7,500,000 (or $10,000,000 if the gross amount exceeds this) and increases the maximum loan amount for development company loans to $10,000,000.
